title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Skills: Instructional Methods Using Integrated University Education Activity Management Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Methods for analyzing curriculum connectivity and consistency using a portal system can be explained
Educational material development time can be reduced by over 30% using the system’s knowledge repository
Real-time collaboration tools can be used to operate a feedback process for instructional design among teachers
The system’s reporting function can be utilized to track learner achievement and develop educational improvement plans
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
